channel.title: I have Realised I Have Broken a Rule
channel.description: I have Realised I Have Broken a Rule ... Rule 6: There is no advertising allowed in this forum. If you are caught, you will get your post edited and may result also in a ban.

item.title: I have Realised I Have Broken a Rule
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

[quote=“SMF Hacks, post:1, topic:117705”]I have Realised I Have Broken a Rule …
Rule 6: There is no advertising allowed in this forum. If you are caught, you will get your post edited and may result also in a ban.[/quote]
Explain why you would tell everyone?

Read full topic
